title: STAT+: Behind new dietary guidelines: Industry-funded studies, opaque science, crushing deadline pressure
description: A look at the "outrageous" timeline and influence issues on the scientific panel that led to a new food pyramid.
content: A look at the "outrageous" timeline and influence issues on the scientific panel that led to a new food pyramid.
